name: The Ice We Skate
description:
The Ice We Skate Was made as part of the GameCraft ALL STARS Jam 2022. The theme was fittingly All Star by Smash Mouth. We took inspiration from the lyrics, "The ice we skate is getting pretty thin" and "My world is on fire, How about yours?"

Instructions:

Circle these losers to dunk em in the water. Don't worry, the water is getting warm they might as well swim. Once all of them take the bath they clearly need you can move on to the next level.

Controls:

W: Speed up

S: Slow down 

A,D: turn

Space: Jump

 

Our Team:

Wendy Hu

Julian Liechty

Jack Shunn

Lucas Qu

Josh Hardy

Special thanks to all the alumni who came back to participate and help with this Jam!
